label: 祇陀林寺
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: Originally the home of Fujiwara no Akimitsu, this Kyoto residence was donated as a Buddhist temple in 1000. The great Buddha of Kawara'in was moved to Gidarinji, and the illustrious Tendai monk 源信 apparently took residence here for a time.
